title: | Steps taken to alleviate water scarcity in open areas

tasks.task: Planting maize in rows using a tractor.
subtasks: Operating a tractor.
Navigating the tractor along rows.
Planting maize seeds at regular intervals.
Discharging fertilizer from a container.
Placing fertilizer into the soil while driving.
Connecting planting apparatus to the tractor.
Ensuring the implement is securely attached.

tasks.task: Driving the tractor through a field.
subtasks: Steering the tractor along the intended path.
Maintaining a consistent speed.
Checking the spacing between planted seeds.
Adjusting the planting depth as needed.
Identifying issues with the planting apparatus.
Making necessary adjustments or repairs.
Ensuring all rows are planted.
Checking the overall quality of planting.
- Plant maize seeds at regular intervals (SUBTASKs)
- Place fertilizer into the soil while driving (SUBTASKs)
- Ensure the implement is securely attached (SUBTASKs)
- Maintain a consistent speed (SUBTASKs)
- Adjust planting depth as needed (SUBTASKs)
- Make necessary adjustments or repairs (SUBTASKs)
- Check the overall quality of planting (SUBTASKs)
